metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10650 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A deserialization flaw was discovered in jackson-databind through 2.9.10.4. It could allow an unauthenticated user to perform code execution via ignite-jta or quartz-core: org.apache.ignite.cache.jta.jndi.CacheJndiTmLookup, org.apache.ignite.cache.jta.jndi.CacheJndiTmFactory, and org.quartz.utils.JNDIConnectionProvider.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
